name: PlaceTemplate
overview:
Add the “where” to your photos and videos!

We provide an open, patent-pending technology offering a centralized, location-based set of fun and intriguing visual templates for use with your own personal digital media (primarily photos & videos). These “Place Templates” are provided by each of your favorite places to visit and are visually descriptive of the place itself, including local geography and business artifacts.

You can use these Place Templates as:

1) Souvenir which is a “fun” photo coupon that YOU create and send to your friends & family to save them REAL money. This is also known as a “Photopon”. 2) Digital “Comic Foreground” photo like from the old days when you’d visit a place that had a themed plywood template for you to place your face in and snap a picture (now modernized and social - but more importantly FUN & ADDICTIVE and all set for robust photo sharing.

Our revenue model is comprised of businesses who gladly pay a small subscription fee to host these templates that are accessible to multiple check-in apps (including our own) and that extend brand awareness and promotional efforts in the most cost-efficient and effective (social word-of-mouth through photos).

Our system is disruptive by design in that businesses can charge a small fee for some templates (non-branded or branded) which opens the doorway for an entirely new marketplace for both designers and business clients who wish to sell these digital items upon customer check-in.

At a higher-level, our parent company - Exlorous - records and mines this data at the human experience level and tracks a whole new experience data set at a place or brand - when someone checks into a place or brand, they are now experiencing the place or brand itself, as well as the intrigue and/or fun in sharing what they’re doing.

By default, our platform also concurrently promotes customer loyalty by sharing each of these media objects using the templates provided by the very brands they love and the locations they frequent.

In summary, we are an “enabler” for extending brand awareness while encouraging friends & family to check out some of the cool new places you’ve discovered or that you frequent. Content always changes at these locations which further entices visitors to return for new discoveries within the digital spectrum.

This product paves the way for an entirely new industry while simultaneously making photo sharing infinitely fun and “SERENDIPITOUS” with the power of new discoveries all around you each and every day and the ability for multiple parties to profit/economically prosper from such an ecosystem :-)

(all while data mining for the bigger, strategic picture)
